column4: anyone here have an opinion on using a 3rd party firmware update for a linksys router?
use ddwrt if you do so...it's quite painless
i was actually looking into that . but dont want to courupt hardware

you won't...just make sure you are plugged into  a reliable power supply and are flashing to ddwrt from any original linksys firmware...if you want to shop around, always reflash   to the original linksys firmware before flashing to a different firmware
